This is the cloud-based version of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011, which will go head to head with other cloud-based CRM products from companies like Salesforce.com and Oracle. Sales professionals are at the heart of almost every successful business, said Steve Ballmer .`` Microsoft Dynamics CRM redefines productivity by offering an industry-leading product that is fully embracing the cloud.
